entry.def: A song is words sung to a tune.

example.tran: 正在演唱一首西班牙歌曲的声音
舞蹈、音乐、哑剧以及歌唱

entry.def: A bird's song is the pleasant, musical sounds that it makes.

example.ex: It's been a long time since I heard a blackbird's song in the evening.
example.tran: 我很久没有听见乌鸫的夜鸣了。

entry.def: If someone bursts into song or breaks into song, they start singing.

example.ex: I feel as if I should break into song.
example.tran: 我觉得自己应该放声歌唱。

entry.def: If you buy something for a song, you buy it for much less than its real value.
entry.tran: 用很便宜的价钱(买下);非常便宜地

example.ex: We found two second-hand chairs that were going for a song.
example.tran: 我们发现了两把准备低价出售的二手椅子。

entry.def: Journalists sometimes describe sports players as being on song when they are playing really well.
entry.tran: 竭尽全力，鼓足劲头，处于良好的竞技状态(新闻用语，形容运动员)

example.ex: Ward is not the most consistent of players, but when he is on song he looks a world-beater.
example.tran: 沃德并不是发挥最稳定的球员，可是一旦进入状态，他似乎就是天下无敌的王者。

sentences.cn: 《诗经》是我国最早的一部诗歌总集.
sentences.en: The Book of Songs is the first anthology of verse in China.

sentences.cn: “诗歌”和“赞美”就在旁边, 所以我也顺手拿了些.
sentences.en: Song and Praise were hanging near, so I just helped myself.

sentences.cn: 这首歌来自一首著名的诗歌.
sentences.en: The song comes from a famous poem.

sentences.cn: 这是我的信念, 是我诗歌, 赞美我救主,昼夜不息.
sentences.en: This is my story, this is my song, Praising my Savior all the day long.

sentences.cn: 乐就包含着诗歌舞乐这些基素.
sentences.en: Hence Yue includes such elements like poems, songs , dances and music.

sentences.cn: 2我们要来感谢他,用诗歌向他欢呼.
sentences.en: Let us come before him with thanksgiving and extol him with music and song.

sentences.cn: 赞美诗:用来颂扬上帝的诗歌或抒情诗.

sentences.cn: 摘要诗歌 、 曲和舞蹈作为交流的工具, 超越了音乐的诸多限制.
sentences.en: As means of communication, poetry, songs and dances transcend many of the limitations of music.

sentences.cn: 54我在世寄居、素来以你的律例为诗歌.
sentences.en: Your decrees are the theme of my song wherever I lodge.

sentences.cn: 诗119:54我在世寄居、素来以你的律例为诗歌.
sentences.en: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.

sentences.cn: 一首诗歌通常都有一段配乐.
sentences.en: A song is usually the musical setting of a poem.

sentences.cn: 能辨识故事, 韵文和歌谣中的常用字词.
sentences.en: Being able to identify common words in stories, rhymes, and songs.

sentences.cn: 先从拼音开始,配以相应的图画 、 文韵文, 生动优美的表情达意.
sentences.en: It uses pictures, songs, and games to motivate kids to learn Chinese.

sentences.cn: 能跟著老师或录音带吟唱歌谣,韵文.
sentences.en: Being able to follow the teacher or audio tape to chant simple songs and rhymes.

sentences.cn: 能听懂简易歌谣和韵文的主要内容.
sentences.en: Being able to understand the main contents of simple songs and rhymes.

sentences.cn: 我醒来时,听到一片鸟叫声.
sentences.en: I woke up and was greeted by bird song.
